     <h1>

       African Art &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16951417">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951417">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951417">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951417">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo, MSN): refcannon
           <br />
           Reference desk IM: talktotrexler
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951417" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951418">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951418">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951418">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951418">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951418" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16951612">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951612">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951612">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951612">
          <div id="boxatt16951612" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19994757">
              <a id="link_19994757" href="http://www.metmuseum.org/toah/intro/atr/06sm.htm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19994757,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19994757}); ">
               Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23032292">
              <a id="link_23032292" href="http://www.metmuseum.org/collection/the-collection-online" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23032292,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23032292}); ">
               Metropolitan Museum of Art
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23032294">
              <a id="link_23032294" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordartonline.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23032294,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18640055}); ">
               Oxford Art Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An expanding range of Oxford’s acclaimed art reference works: Grove Art Online, the Benezit Dictionary of Artists, the Encyclopedia of Aesthetics, The Oxford Companion to Western Art, and The Concise Oxford Dictionary of Art Terms, as well as many specially commissioned articles and bibliographies available exclusively online.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951420">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951420">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951420">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative commentary in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951420">
          <div id="boxatt16951420" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23032335">
              <a id="link_23032335" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23032335,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19994512">
              <a id="link_19994512" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19994512,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19994512}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To peak inside books before requesting on interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951421">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951421">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951421">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative commentary in periodicals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951421">
          <div id="boxatt16951421" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23053606">
              <a id="link_23053606" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23053606,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728981}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index and selected full text from art periodicals, 1929-present. Full text journals include Architects' Journal, Art Bulletin, and Art Journal.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19994517">
              <a id="link_19994517" href="http://web.ebscohost.com/ehost/search/advanced?sid=71e8ef1f-0c62-4569-b7af-19c10756dedc%40sessionmgr4004&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4104" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19994517,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19994517}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Subscription databases, in non-U.S. history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19994518">
              <a id="link_19994518" href="http://www.jstor.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19994518,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19994518}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. An archive for many scholarly journals including some in art history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24963991">
              <a id="link_24963991" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24963991,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'African Art', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4610782" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16951422">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951422">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951422">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16951422">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
            .
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951422" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16951423">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16951423">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16951423">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951423">
          Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
          <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           interlibrary loan
          </a>
          by filling out the appropriate form for
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illj~S0">
           articles
          </a>
          or
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illb~S0">
           books
          </a>
          .
          <div id="boxatt16951423" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

     </div>

    <img alt="Tip" style="top:-200px; left:-500px;" id="tippointer" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/tippointer.gif" />
    <div id="popupinfo" class="popup" style="visibility: visible; top:-200px; left:-500px;">
     <div class="popup_head">
      <table align="right" border="0">
       <tr>
        <td valign="bottom" height="18">
         <a href="#" onclick="return hideAlert('popupinfo')">
          <img alt="Close" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/window_close_grey.gif" border="0" align="absbottom" />
         </a>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </table>
      <div id="popupinfotitle" style="display:inline;">
       <h6>
        More Information
       </h6>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="popup_body">
      <div id="popupinfocontent" style="display:inline;">
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </div>
      <br />
      <center>
       <a href="#" onclick="hideAlert('popupinfo'); return false;">
        Close
       </a>
      </center>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="dp" style="width:850px;">
   &nbsp;
  </div>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
